executable.title: Iterative Maximum Overlap Construction (IMOC)
executable.description:
Single and multi-shell sampling scheme estimation using Iterative Maximum Overlap Construction (IMOC).
\ Examples: 
\ SamplingSchemeQSpaceIMOCEstimation grad.txt --numberOfSamples 28,28,28 --tessOrder 7 
\ SamplingSchemeQSpaceIMOCEstimation grad.txt --numberOfSamples 30 --tessOrder 7

file.name: _OutputOrientations
file.description: Output orientation file(s), single shell or multiple shells.

integer-vector.name: _NumberOfSamples
integer-vector.label: Number of samples in shells
integer-vector.description: number of samples in single/multiple shells.

file.name: _FineOrientations
file.description: A given fine orientations. It overrides --tessOrder

float.name: _MinChange
float.description: Minimal change percentage of the angles in iterations.

integer.name: _Order
integer.label: Tessellation Order
integer.description: Tessellation order for the fine orientations.

float.name: _Weight
float.description: Weight for single shell term, 1-weight for mutiple shell term.
